name: LIT (itch) (KDU Glenmarie Games)
description:
Years have past and there was never another invasion or attack from Xiuhcoatl, with that in mind, everyone has lost the vision of how dangerous he could be and how important the temple and shrines are. The temple had always practiced a custom to take care of all the shrines and temple to prevent any chances for Xiuhcoatl to be released.

No one in the village has given respect since the incident has passed long ago and the disciples of the temple are being looked down upon for their beliefs and practices. The peace in Acotlan has been disturbed once again. People have gone missing and corps are not growing properly. Many do not suspect Xiuhcoatl but blamed on the wild animals, but little did they know, another great disaster is approaching, and it is coming faster than ever.

Zero Hour are a group of 8 students from KDU University College Bachelor of Game Development programe. We aspire to achieve great targets from personal to a team perspective.
